sojourn.compartment_periods_calculated.e.rationale: Estimates of the incubation period have included 5.1 days, 5.2 days and 4.8 days [6] [7] [8] [9]. A systematic review [2] found that data are best fitted by a log-normal distribution (mean 5.8 days, CI 5.0 to 6.7, median 5.1 days). Our systematic review [10] found that estimates of the mean incubation period have varied from 3.6 to 7.4 days.
